original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na āsava vippayutto ca dhammā

original: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: āsava sampayuttañca āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā āsava sampayuttañca āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsava sampayuttañca āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsava sampayutto ca na āsava vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
